mapper.insert: insert into category values ( null, #{name }, "카테고리 내용을 추가해주세요", #{blogId })
mapper.select: select no, name, description, blog_id as blogId from category where blog_id = #{id } order by no desc
select no, name, description, blog_id as blogId from category where name = #{name }

select a.no, a.name, a.description, a.blog_id, ifnull(b.postCount, 0) as postCount from category a left join (select category_no, count(category_no) as postCount from post group by category_no) b on a.no = b.category_no where a.blog_id = #{blogId };
